markdown.markdown:
::: {.hero style="background-color:#eaf3fc; padding: 3rem; border-radius: 16px; text-align: left;"} **A global initiative to support HTA analysts in low- and middle-income countries using open-source R tools.** We help health economists and decision modelers in LMICs use R for cost-effectiveness analysis and health technology assessment. [Explore Our Tutorials](tutorials.qmd){.btn .btn-primary} [Meet the Committee](people.qmd){.btn .btn-outline} ::: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ::: section-box ## Who We Are {.section-title} [R-HTA in LMICs](about.qmd) is the regional chapter of the global [R-HTA](https://r-hta.org/) consortium.\ We promote the use of R for HTA in LMICs through open-access tutorials, workshops, and resources. [Learn More](about.qmd) ::: ::::::: section-box ## What We Do {.section-title} :::::: card-grid ::: card

Tutorials

Hands-on R training for health economists. ::: ::: card

Resources

Curated tools and links for R and HTA. ::: ::: card

Events

Workshops led by international experts. ::: :::::: ::::::: ::: section-box ## Get Involved {.section-title} - Visit our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/R-HTA-in-LMICs) - Join our mailing list via the [R-HTA main site](https://r-hta.org/) ::: ::: section-box ## Recent Event Highlight {.section-title} **Introduction to R for HTA Modelling – 25 September 2023** ![Intro tutorial banner](assets/images/Registrations%20open%20-%2025%20Sept%202023%20training%20.png) This half-day interactive tutorial trained LMIC health analysts on using R for HTA modelling.\ Participants learned R basics and built a simple cost-effectiveness model. [View Workshop Materials](https://github.com/R-HTA-in-LMICs/Introduction-to-R-for-HTA-2023) ::: ::: section-box ## Past Tutorials {.section-title} [Browse our full list of tutorials](tutorials.qmd) :::
